articles.description: Moscow began distributing the Sputnik V COVID-19 shot via 70 clinics on Saturday, marking Russia's first mass vaccination against the disease, the city's coronavirus task force said.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
MOSCOW, Dec 5 (Reuters) - Moscow began distributing the Sputnik V COVID-19 shot via 70 clinics on Saturday, marking Russias first mass vaccination against the disease, the citys cor… [+2288 chars]

articles.title: Why RBI has restricted HDFC bank from launching new digital facilities, issuing credit cards - ThePrint
articles.description: RBI issues order to HDFC Bank to temporarily stop all launches of digital business-generating activities and other proposed IT applications.
articles.content: Mumbai: On 2 December, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) asked HDFC Bank, the largest private sector lender in the country, to halt all launches of its digital business generating activities under its … [+6164 chars]
